source: TEXT_GAIUSA611_00773_SEQ_00<tab>Erimmont of the Mun<var 1F /var>Tuy Cellars would put you to work as an apprentice masher.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA611_00773_SEQ_00<tab>ムントゥイ醸造庫の醸造家エリモンは、冒険者に簡単な仕事を頼みたいようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA611_00773_SEQ_01<tab>In order to obtain a bottle of Mun<var 1F /var>Tuy sauce without delay, you have agreed to help Erimmont apply the finishing touches to the latest batch. To start, you have been instructed to obtain the following three secret spices from the cellar's stores: a perilla leaf, an onze of Shroud pepper, and a dried dragon pepper.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA611_00773_SEQ_01<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E86E301 /var>の仕上げを手伝うことになった。「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E86E201 /var>」「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E87C301 /var>」「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E87C401 /var>」を手に入れよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA611_00773_SEQ_02<tab>You have obtained the perilla leaf, Shroud pepper, and dried dragon pepper as bade. Add them to the gyle-fat to ensure Erimmont's Mun<var 1F /var>Tuy sauce is given its distinctive flavor.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA611_00773_SEQ_02<tab>ムントゥイ醸造庫の釜に、入手した「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E86E201 /var>」「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E87C301 /var>」「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E87C401 /var>」を入れよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA611_00773_SEQ_03<tab>The secret seasonings have been added, and the fermentation process complete. Speak with Geoffrey and obtain a bottle of Mun<var 1F /var>Tuy sauce.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA611_00773_SEQ_03<tab>釜に隠し味をすべて入れた。ジョフリーと話して「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E86E301 /var>」を受け取ろう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA611_00773_SEQ_04<tab>After quite an ordeal, you have obtained a bottle of Mun<var 1F /var>Tuy sauce. Deliver it to Aedoc before she is devoured alive by her own men.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA611_00773_SEQ_04<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E86E301 /var>を入手した。クォーリーミルの「エドック」に渡そう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA611_00773_SEQ_05<tab>Aedoc is overjoyed to be restocked with Mun<var 1F /var>Tuy sauce. Despite its unusual aroma, it remains an indispensable ingredient in many a beloved Gridanian dish.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA611_00773_SEQ_05<tab>エドックは冒険者のかえりを待ちわびていたようだ。<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E86E301 /var>はグリダニア料理になくてはならないものらしい。香りは好き好きとのことだ。
TEXT_GAIUSA611_00773_TODO_00<tab>醸造庫の倉庫から<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E86E201 /var>を入手

source: TEXT_GAIUSA611_00773_TODO_01<tab>Retrieve an onze of Shroud pepper.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA611_00773_TODO_01<tab>醸造庫の倉庫から<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E87C301 /var>を入手
TEXT_GAIUSA611_00773_TODO_02<tab>醸造庫の倉庫から<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E87C401 /var>を入手

source: TEXT_GAIUSA611_00773_TODO_03<tab>Add the secret spices to the gyle-fat.
TEXT_GAIUSA611_00773_TODO_05<tab>Deliver the Mun<var 1F /var>Tuy sauce to Aedoc.
TEXT_GAIUSA611_00773_ERIMMONT_000_000<tab>Where's your Mun<var 1F /var>Tuy sauce, you say? Look, friend, Gridania wasn't built in a day.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA611_00773_ERIMMONT_000_000<tab>……ソースはまだできあがらないのか、だって？
そんなに早く欲しいんだったら、
最後の仕上げを手伝っておくれ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA611_00773_ERIMMONT_000_001<tab>I'll tell you what, though─if you're so eager, how's about you help me put the finishing touches on my latest batch? You just might learn a thing or two in the process.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA611_00773_ERIMMONT_000_001<tab>奥の醸造釜で<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E86E301 /var>を仕上げているから、
釜の中に、隠し味を入れてくれるかい。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA611_00773_ERIMMONT_000_002<tab>Here on these shelves, I keep my stock of secret spices. What gives my Mun<var 1F /var>Tuy sauce its distinctive punch, you ask? A perilla leaf, a dried dragon pepper, and an onze of Shroud pepper. Just toss all three in the gyle-fat, and Geoffrey will take care of the rest. When the sauce is done, you're free to take a bottle to Aedoc─not that that's like to put an end to her whinin'.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA611_00773_ERIMMONT_000_002<tab>必要な隠し味は3種類。そいつが味を引き締めるんだ。
倉庫にあるから、釜まで運んで入れておくれ。
ソースができたら、クォーリーミルに届けてやりな。
TEXT_GAIUSA611_00773_SYSTEM_000_000<tab>醸造庫の倉庫からeobj「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E86E201 /var>」をゲット
TEXT_GAIUSA611_00773_SYSTEM_000_001<tab>ムントゥイ醸造庫の釜に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E86E201 /var>」を3つトレード。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA611_00773_NPC1_000_010<tab>Oh, hullo there. Apprenticing at the cellars for the day? Very well, then. One perilla leaf, one dried dragon pepper, and an onze of Shroud pepper, and... Mmm-mmm! Erimmont's done it again! As thanks for your help, this bottle is on the house.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA611_00773_NPC1_000_010<tab>手伝いかい？　ご苦労さま。
……スパイスをよ～くかき混ぜて……さあ、完成だ！
これが自慢の「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E86E301 /var>」だよ。さあ、どうぞ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSA611_00773_AEDOC_000_010<tab>You're back! Oh, do tell me you've brought my Mun<var 1F /var>Tuy sauce! I swear to you, I just overheard a Wood Wailer talking about tossing <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var> into the cauldron!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA611_00773_AEDOC_000_010<tab>ああ、待っていましたよ！
衛士さんたちがお腹をすかして暴動寸前なんです！

source: TEXT_GAIUSA611_00773_AEDOC_000_020<tab>Ah, the distinctive, mouthwatering aroma of Mun<var 1F /var>Tuy beans─topped off with Erimmont's special blend of secret spices, no doubt! He has done it again! Thank you, friend─I daresay you've prevented a mutiny today!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA611_00773_AEDOC_000_020<tab>ムントゥイ豆を使ったソースは、グリダニア料理の要です！
独特のコクと味わいで、皆に大人気なんですよ！
香りは……まぁ、好き好きですがね……。
